item.title: Books worth reading
item.description: Book reading stats In May 2020, I’ve decided to keep track of my reading habits. Below are simple reading stats. Completed per year: 2020: 4 Total number of completed books: 4 In English Unthinkable by: Helen Thompson meta published: 2018 genres: psychology, science completed: 2020-08-08 links: Quotes: Life without memory is not life at all… Our memory, is our coherence, our reason our feeling, even our action.
